content: e xpe di t i on hat needles us 8 / 5 0mm 16 circular needle us 10 / 6 0mm 16 circular needle us 10 / 6 0mm double pointed needles notions cabling needle one stitch marker darning needle for weaving in ends gauge 9 sts x 13 row = 2 in stockinette sizes child adult = 14 16 circumference un- stretched cables set apart from one another create a hat abbreviations that s both functional and warm and stylish and unique co = co c6f = cable 6 front k = knit k2tog = knit two stitches together yarn p = purl 150 yards lion brand fisherman s wool 100% p2tog = purl two stitches together wool 465 yds / 425 meters per 227 grams round = round ssk = slip slip knit decrease sts = stitches ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ she makes hats - http //www shemakeshats com for pattern support shemakeshats@gmail com copying or redistributing this pattern is forbidden pattern can be used for personal or charitable purposes or to make hats to sell on etsy craft fairs etc if you sell finished items from this pattern please link back to my shop http //www shemakeshats etsy com e xpe di t i on hat directions using long tail method and smaller needles co 72 84 sts place marker to join being careful not to twist k 2 p 2 around repeat until hat measures 2 5 from co edge switch to larger needles round 1-9 k6 p6 repeat around round 10 c6f p6 repeat around repeat rows1-10 2 3 more times shape crown switch to dpns when necessary drnd 1 k6 p6 repeat around drnd 2 k2 k2tog k2 p2 p2tog p2 repeat around drnd 3 k5 p5 repeat around finishing drnd 4 k1 k2tog k2 p1 p2tog p2 repeat around break yarn leaving a long tail use darning needle to thread yarn through remaining sts pull drnd 5 k4 p4 repeat around yarn tight and secure drnd 6 ssk k2tog p2tog p2tog weave in all ends repeat around drnd 7 k2 p2 repeat around share drnd 8 k2tog p2tog repeat around drnd 9 k1 p1 repeat around i d love to see your finished hats tag your projects #shemakeshats on instagram to share drnd 10 k2tog repeat around ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ she makes hats - http //www shemakeshats com for pattern support shemakeshats@gmail com copying or redistributing this pattern is forbidden pattern can be used for personal or charitable purposes or to make hats to sell on etsy craft fairs etc if you sell finished items from this pattern please link back to my shop http //www shemakeshats etsy com
